data.title: Home Page
data.meta_description: ARI Legacy Sleepers manufactures high-end custom sleepers for semi trucks.
data.text:
In fact our best sales people are past customers!

We understand what it's like to live life on the road, because one of our original founders was an owner operator. ARI's quality takes all the worry out of owning a custom truck sleeper and we believe that ARI builds the best custom sleepers on the road.

We have researched it from every angle and have concluded that owning an ARI custom sleeper will raise your monthly truck payment, BUT SAVE YOU more than enough each month to easily make up the difference.

Contact us today!

Click Here
